title: AI in Education Workshop
description: Explore how artificial intelligence is reshaping classrooms. We'll dive into adaptive learning systems and ethical AI practices in education.

title: Community Coding Bootcamp
description: A week-long crash course in full-stack web development. Ideal for beginners and intermediate learners alike. Bring your own laptop!

title: Entrepreneurship Panel Discussion
description: Join our panel of successful entrepreneurs and investors to learn about startup journeys, funding tips, and building sustainable business models.

title: Exam Stress Management Seminar
description: Learn practical strategies to manage anxiety and perform better during exam periods. Includes a short mindfulness session.

title: Open Day 2025
description: Prospective students and parents are invited to tour our campus, meet faculty, and attend orientation sessions.
